creator: oeyoews
text:
\define save-tiddler-actions() <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-field" $name={{{ [get[text]] }}} $value={{{ [get[text]] }}}/> <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-save-tiddler"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-auto-save-wiki"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> \end \define config-visibility-title() $:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define importFileActions() <$action-popup $state=<> $coords="(0,0,0,0)" $floating="yes"/> \end <$set name="currentItem" value={{$:/state/gtd/edit}}> <$set name="td-baseName" value={{{ [removeprefix[$:/]] }}}>
> data-tags={{!!tags}} class="tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-edit-frame tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-system xp-gtd-editor"> <$fieldmangler> <$vars storyTiddler=<>> <$keyboard key="((save-tiddler))" actions=<> tag="div"> <$edit-text tiddler="$:/state/gtd/edit-caption" tag="input" class="tc-titlebar tc-edit-texteditor" focus="yes" tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} cancelPopups="yes"/>
<$set name="edit-preview-state" value={{{ [{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}!match[yes]then[$:/state/showeditpreview]] :else[] }}}> <$vars importTitle=<> importState=<> > <$dropzone importTitle=<> autoOpenOnImport="no" contentTypesFilter={{$:/config/Editor/ImportContentTypesFilter}} class="tc-dropzone-editor" enable={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} filesOnly="yes" actions=<> ><$reveal stateTitle=<> type="match" text="yes" tag="div"> <$tiddler tiddler=<>>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/>
<$transclude tiddler={{$:/state/editpreviewtype}} mode="inline"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/preview/output" mode="inline"/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<> type="nomatch" text="yes" tag="div"> <$edit tiddler=<> field="text" class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body" placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}} tabindex={{$:/config/EditTabIndex}} focus={{{ [{$:/config/AutoFocus}match[text]then[true]] ~[[false]] }}} cancelPopups="yes" fileDrop={{{ [{$:/config/DragAndDrop/Enable}match[no]] :else[subfilter{$:/config/Editor/EnableImportFilter}then[yes]else[no]] }}} ><$set name="targetTiddler" value=<> ><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]]" ><$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text="hide" class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper" ><$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button" mode="inline" /><$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]" ><$list filter={{!!condition}} variable="list-condition" ><$transclude/>
<>
title: $:/xp/aggregation-gtd/ui/EditTemplate
footer: Status: <$list filter="[!tag[done]]">undone <$list filter="[removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/todolist/data/status/]search:text[undone]]"> <$list filter="[!tag[done]]"> / todolist <$list filter="[tag[done]]"> <$list filter="[removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/todolist/data/status/]!search:text[undone]]"> completed <$button tooltip="Delete all information about this item" class="py-btn"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[prefix[$:/todolist/data]suffix]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/>   <$button tooltip="Confirm changes to this item. ctrl-Enter" class="py-btn"> {{$:/core/images/done-button}} <$list filter="[get[caption]!match{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}]"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $field="caption" $value={{$:/state/gtd/edit-caption}}/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler"/>
subtitle: {{$:/xp/images/q4}} 不重要不紧急
